reviewText: i thought it was good all the dancing was good even with out knowing chinese mandarin one can get the point
Performance was great. But without subtitle, even a Chinese-speaker can barely understand what they're saying, not to mention English speakers! Disappointing. Wouldn't have bought it if I knew.
Got this DVD as a part of B-day gift for my dad. He is a big Chinese opera fan. According to him, this is a good DVD.
